name: Word Rings Puzzle 2
description:
Clear the rings by guessing 20 words. Use photos or the text as clues.

Each levels has photo and text that contains clues. You can tap on the picture to zoom in for a closer look. Read and look at the clues and then find the word that is in any way related to the photo or text. Some answers are straightforward, some are quite tricky. Enjoy this addictive brainteaser!

Features:
• Less typing, more fun!
• Play in English, French, German, Russian, Italian, Spanish or Portuguese
• New way to play word search.

If you like pics and word association games, this puzzle is for you!
